metadata.title: CVE-2016-9011 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The wmf_malloc function in api.c in libwmf 0.2.8.4 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted wmf file,which triggers a memory allocation failure.

criterions.comment: libwmf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
